data.persona: I own the bazaar in the village.  I sell a variety of items that I know you must need.  But I also have some items in the back that I only sell to certain people.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from oak wood. It is very small due to the wood aisles. The front of the store has a big wooden table as well as a scale.
There's a porcelain vase, some wood aisles, a big wooden table, a basket of grain, a scale, and an oak wood here.
A rat and an assistant are here.

You are carrying a sleeping bag and a monkey's hand, wearing some boots and a shirt, and wielding a whip and a dagger.
data.goal: put monkey's hand on wood aisles

data.short_motivation: I will get rid of this monkey hand by selling it to some chump as a good luck charm.
data.mid_motivation: I will hope that the assistant DOES have some good luck, and will tell his friends and customers about the monkey hand that I sold him.
data.long_motivation: I will establish a market for monkey hand charms, and make lots of money selling them.
